name: Atolota
description:
Atolota is a 2D coop platformer where each player controls half of a soul. Journey through challenging levels to become whole once again.

This game was submitted to the Brackeys Game Jam 2021. This is a demo version and we are still actively working on the game.

Credits:

Programming - David Zheng

Art - Sherry He

Art - Cathrine Guo

Audio - Terence Zhang

SFX Sourced From:

  • zapsplat.com
  • Planman
